706971f.text:
Surf Ave., east from West 12th Street, showing in the right foreground, the (present (1929) Cyclone Roller Coaster, and also the Feltmann's eating
establishment.
NTE~~3EE0  About 1903.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

706965f-a.text:
Surf Ave., south side, at West 12th Street, showing partially, at the right, Child's Restaurant, and on the opposite corner the Brooklyn Trust Co. Coney Island Branch building.
January 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

706963f-b.text:
(1)
Surf Ave., north side, west of West 12th Street, showing the Boston Hotel in the foreground, and Loew's theatre (8-story structure in the background).
October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, showing Loew's Theatre under construction.
November 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)
The same, showing the theatre building completed.
June 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

706969f-d.text:
(1)
Suef Ave., Morth side, east of West 19th Street, showiag Luna Park, wh ich extends to East 10th Street. This park was established, May 16, 1903, ky Thowpsoa and Dundy on 22 acres of ground, which increased to 38 acres in 1904. Frederick Thowpson conducted same, alone, at a la ter
date. Ia 1924, Barroa Collier was the ownr.
September 1926.
Eugene L. Arwkruster Collection.
(2)
Another view in the opposite direction.
January 1924.
Eugene L. Arwkruster Collection.
(3)
A view of the entraace.
January 1924.
EVgene L. Arwbruster Collectdoa.
(4)
An interior view of the park, undouktedly quite early.
About 1905.
Eugene L. Armkruster Collection.

706970f-b.text:
(1) Surf Ave., north side, east from West 12th Street, showing at the left, the entrance to Luna Park.

August 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection

(2) The same, another angle.

June 1925.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection

(3) A view further eastward and showing Thompson Scenic Railway, an attraction of the park, that was operated as a separate unit.

January 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection

(4) The same as No. 3.

April 2, 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
